channel.title: Trgedy pk client help
channel.description: ok so tragedy pk client has that little change button that changes gameframes before you login how can i make the default gameframe 562 and remove the change button?? pleas help rep ++

item.title: Trgedy pk client help
item.dc:creator: @xLightning xLightning
item.description:
@xLightning wrote:

In client.java it should show something like this at the beginning:

public class client extends RSApplet { public boolean is459 = false, is474 = true, is480 = false, is508 = false, is525 = false, idToggle = false, hitbarToggle = false, menuToggle = false, namesToggle = false, hitmarks = false; public boolean cursePray = true; public int tColour = 0; public int tEffect = 0; public static boolean newDamage = false, normalLogin = true;//KEEP TRUE!

Just change

is474 = true,

to

is474 = false,

and then search for:

	public boolean is562 = false;

and change that to

  public boolean is562 = true;

Then delete/rename Change1.png and Change2.png in

/class/.ss_474/sprites/interfaces/bank/

Compile and it should work. You could go through and remove everything that has to do with the gameframes but this should be fine for what you are wanting to do.

Read full topic
